Moyinoluwa AdeyemiÂ is an Android Developer at Zola Electric. The team that she is a part of works on an app that enables people in Sub-Saharan Africa to have access to clean energy. Before Zola Electric, she was the sole Android Developer at Swifta Systems. She has a bachelorâ€™s degree in Computer Science with Mathematics from Obafemi Awolowo University, Nigeria.

She started the first Women Techmakers group in Nigeria at her university in 2013, managed the Google Developers Group there for 3 years and she was a co-organizer for the Google Developers Group in Lagos for almost four years.Â
